actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to prohibit the construction of additional drive-in banking facilities.

summary.text: Prohibits federally insured banks, savings and loan associations, and credit unions and any bank or savings and loan association eligible to apply for Federal deposit insurance from beginning the construction of any drive-in banking facility after the effective date of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the construction of additional drive-in banking facilities.
